resources.string: The Toronto Eaton Centre (corporately styled as the CF Toronto Eaton Centre since September 2015)[1] is a shopping mall and office complex in Downtown Toronto, Ontario, Canada.

The Toronto Islands (formerly known as Island of Hiawatha and also known as Menecing, meaning "On the Island" in the Ojibwa language)[1][2] are a chain of small islands in Lake Ontario, south of mainland Toronto, Ontario, Canada.

The Toronto Islands (formerly known as Island of Hiawatha and also known as Menecing, meaning "On the Island" in the Ojibwa language)[1][2] are a chain of small islands in Lake Ontario, south of mainland Toronto, Ontario, Canada.
